deckInfo.name: Chinese Learning - Electronic Girl v3::L1 - Intro/Verse 1 Patterns
deckInfo.description: Focuses on the 忽X忽Y patterns from the intro/first verse: 忽近忽远, 忽隐忽现, 忽明忽暗, 忽快忽慢. Introduces component characters and then the full phrases.

conceptGroups.description: The core character 忽 and its role in forming adverbial phrases.

vocabulary.name: hu1
vocabulary.explanation: Base character for patterns like 忽近忽远, 忽隐忽现, etc. From the lyric line '忽近忽远'.

conceptGroups.groupName: Pattern 1: 忽近忽远 (hū jìn hū yuǎn) - Suddenly Near, Suddenly Far
conceptGroups.description: Characters 近 (jìn) and 远 (yuǎn) and the full phrase from the lyrics.

vocabulary.name: jin4
vocabulary.explanation: Component of the phrase 忽近忽远 (suddenly near, suddenly far).

vocabulary.name: yuan3
vocabulary.explanation: Component of the phrase 忽近忽远 (suddenly near, suddenly far).

vocabulary.name: hu_jin_hu_yuan
vocabulary.explanation: Full lyric line. Pattern: 忽 + Adj1 + 忽 + Adj2, meaning 'suddenly Adj1, suddenly Adj2'.

conceptGroups.groupName: Pattern 2: 忽隐忽现 (hū yǐn hū xiàn) - Suddenly Hidden, Suddenly Appearing

vocabulary.name: xian4

vocabulary.name: hu_yin_hu_xian
vocabulary.explanation: Full lyric line. Follows the 忽X忽Y pattern, meaning 'suddenly hidden, suddenly appearing'.
